title: HOUR 1 - Westbrook, Harbaugh, McCarthy, Raiders
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Westbrook, Harbaugh, McCarthy, Raiders
description:
LeBron James wanted Russell Westbrook

Jim Harbaugh would take the Raiders HC job if offered

Mike McCarthy is doubling down on being wrong


Guest: Maxx Crosby
